Headline: #81 Lawrence Temporary Reroute at Lawrence/Leclaire
ShortDescription: 81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Lovejoy, Foster, Cicero and Lawrence: due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Leclaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#81 Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Lovejoy, Foster, Cicero and Lawrence: due to, street blockage near Lawrence/Leclaire.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Pulaski.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
